009package ImageAccessorDemos;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.image.access.ImageAccessor;
016import imagingbook.common.image.access.ScalarAccessor;
017import imagingbook.common.image.access.VectorAccessor;
018
019/**
020 * This plugin demonstrates the of class {@link ImageAccessor} for
021 * unified access to scalar and vector-valued images.
022 * The plugin adds 20 brightness units to each component (color
023 * plane) of the active image. It can be applied to any image type.
024 * Image pixels are treated as vectors, even if only a single
025 * component is present.
026 * TODO: move to other package
027 * 
028 * @author WB
029 *
030 * @see ImageAccessor
031 * @see ScalarAccessor
032 * @see VectorAccessor
033 */
034public class ImageAccessor_Demo_Vector implements PlugInFilter {
035
036        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus img) {
037                return DOES_ALL;
038        }
039
040        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
041                final int width = ip.getWidth();
042                final int height = ip.getHeight();
043                
044                ImageAccessor ia = ImageAccessor.create(ip, null, null);
045                IJ.log(ia.toString());
046                
047                for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
048                        for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
049                                float[] vals = ia.getPix(u, v);         // get a single pixel (vector)
050                                for (int i = 0; i < vals.length; i++) {
051                                        vals[i] += 20;
052                                }
053                                ia.setPix(u, v, vals);
054                        }
055                }
056        }
057
058}
